questions.text: I have spiritual reserves I can draw on in difficult times — my tank is not perpetually near empty.
I have accumulated spiritual insights, experiences, and wisdom that I can share with others.
My spiritual life generates more than it consumes — I'm not constantly depleted, running on fumes.
I have developed a relationship with God deep enough that I have something real to offer others seeking Him.
My prayer life, Scripture knowledge, and spiritual practices have accumulated into a resource I can deploy.
